basic_info.description: Software Developer with a PhD in Music Composition and a previous career teaching music theory. Passionate about solving problems with creative solutions and eager to contribute to a collaborative team.\nLanguages, Databases and Libraries: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, C#, C++, Java, React, React Native, Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, HTML5, CSS3\nTechnologies: VS Code, Visual Studio, Git, GitHub, Netlify, Render.com, AWS, Jest

projects.title: VolunteerBridge
description: A mobile app developed by a collaborative team to connect volunteers with nonprofits.
Implements secure login with biometric identification, enhancing user data protection.
Technologies used: React Native, Expo, Node, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Harmony Navigator
description: Web app for practicing basic music theory listening skills
Engages users in interactive listening exercises, enhancing their interval recognition skills.
Tracks users’ results including their strengths and areas for improvement.
Technologies used: Solo project built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

experience.title: Full Stack Software Developer – Volunteer
activites: Developing an AI-powered chatbot using OpenAI's language models designed to connect students and families affected by homelessness and housing insecurity with technology and educational resources.

experience.title: Philadelphia, Music Theory Instructor
activites: Developed and integrated interactive tools with Max/MSP and Auralia software, resulting in 82% of students reporting enhanced engagement and learning outcomes.
Utilized innovative assessment methods for exams, accurately evaluating and improving student mastery of course material, according to 91% of polled students.

experience.title: Assistant Recording Engineer
activites: Recorded and edited over 6 concerts per semester using Logic Pro and Pro Tools, ensuring high-quality audio production achieving a 100% satisfaction rate from the lead sound engineer.
Applied ORTF stereo technique with Shure KSM137 microphones to capture professional-grade audio.
